actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution expressing the opinion of the House that the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the text of S. 1871, to extend the existing antitrust exemption for oil companies that participate in the agreement on an international energy program, is an infringement of the privileges of the House; and providing for a return of said bill, and the Senate amendments to the House amendments thereto, to the Senate.

summary.text: Expresses the opinion of the House of Representatives that the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the text of S. 1871 (extending antitrust exemptions for oil companies that participate in an agreement on an international energy program) is an infringement of the privileges of the House of Representatives. Directs that such bill, with the amendments, be returned to the Senate with a message communicating the resolution.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the opinion of the House that the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the text of S. 1871, to extend the existing antitrust exemption for oil companies that participate in the agreement on an international energy program, is an infringement of the privileges of the House; and providing for a return of said bill, and the Senate amendments to the House amendments thereto, to the Senate.
